'''Talbot''' is a minor character mentioned in [[Season 3]]. He is a man-at-arms sworn to [[House Frey]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character named Talbot, as this scene does not take place.
